text: A very Happy Thanksgiving to you all! How about a round of Gin after dinner?
Come have a seat at @IAmCicelyTyson's & my table. Card table that is!
Are you ready to rummy friends? @IAmCicelyTyson and I want to invite you to a…friendly…game of cards.
I feel lucky to share such a special story on stage every night. Let me share @gingamebroadway with you.

column4: thank you for your support. You are what keeps me coming back to Broadway for more.

text: All bets are off when @IAmCicelyTyson and I take the stage together every night. She always keeps me on my toes!
Broadway's dealt me a great hand. I hope to see you at the card table! @gingamebroadway
Six nights of @gingamebroadway each week and you’d think I’d be somewhat of a card shark by now…

column4: it's still a rush every time. Cheers to a great opening night @gingamebroadway.

text: It’s so great to be back on Broadway with @IAmCicelyTyson. Ever the incredible scene partner…and an even better opponent!
Previews are going splendidly. It's been full houses and the audiences are wonderful. Thanks for your energy! @gingamebroadway
Thank you to @TheWing for your tribute last night. I'm truly touched. http://t.co/dt124rx43X
Thank you for the warm welcome to Twitter
It's been a great run of rehearsals
column4: but tonight marks the first preview. @gingamebroadway is ready to rummy.
